# Temporary place for test vectors and tests preparation

To be used for evo test suite.


## blockgetjson
time python3 commands.py blockgetjson 1589600

real	0m0.092s
user	0m0.052s
sys	0m0.008s

4.4.0.9 version  
```
[{"block_height": 1589600, "timestamp": 1583317436.92, "address": "b54317cb538c6b3a5ae8b84f8b53c83652037038ad8ad6bef4c8b43a", "recipient": "b54317cb538c6b3a5ae8b84f8b53c83652037038ad8ad6bef4c8b43a", "amount": 0,            "signature": "", "public_key": "", "block_hash": "7137ee4dd28ecc3f40485dc09f294fa798f3a5dabb87adc6ef423401", "fee": 0,            "reward": 5.37309091,   "operation": "0", "openfield": "000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000041879;6966?3355>"}]
```

Note: amount, fee, reward are as float


New evo version  
```
[{"block_height": 1589600, "timestamp": 1583317436.92, "address": "b54317cb538c6b3a5ae8b84f8b53c83652037038ad8ad6bef4c8b43a", "recipient": "b54317cb538c6b3a5ae8b84f8b53c83652037038ad8ad6bef4c8b43a", "amount": "0.00000000", "signature": "", "public_key": "", "block_hash": "7137ee4dd28ecc3f40485dc09f294fa798f3a5dabb87adc6ef423401", "fee": "0.00000000", "reward": "5.37309091", "operation": "0", "openfield": "000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000041879;6966?3355>", "format": "Legacy"}]
```

Note: Amount, fee, reward are given as string, with the proper decimals and no more as floats.

## blockget

New evo version  
time python3 commands.py blockget 1589600

```
Requested block: [[1589600, 1583317436.92, 'b54317cb538c6b3a5ae8b84f8b53c83652037038ad8ad6bef4c8b43a', 'b54317cb538c6b3a5ae8b84f8b53c83652037038ad8ad6bef4c8b43a', '0.00000000', '', '', '7137ee4dd28ecc3f40485dc09f294fa798f3a5dabb87adc6ef423401', '0.00000000', '5.37309091', '0', '000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000041879;6966?3355>']]
```
Requested block number of transactions: 1
Requested block height: 1589600

real	0m0.096s
user	0m0.052s
sys	0m0.012s
